Rule #1 of showrunning: The room is sacred. The room is a cone of silence. If it doesn't exist in the room... it won't exist anywhere else.

— Jeffrey Lieber (@JeffLieber) April 4, 2011

Rule #2 of Showrunning: Production is your FRIEND. Imagining a rabid bear... easy. Getting that bear on screen... much harder.

— Jeffrey Lieber (@JeffLieber) April 5, 2011

Showrunner Rule #3: "Act outs" are the death of verisimilitude. It's one of the reasons that pay cable TV is so much more "real".

— Jeffrey Lieber (@JeffLieber) April 6, 2011

Showrunner Rule #4: Great material ON TIME. Great material ON TIME. Great material ON TIME. Getting a tattoo wouldn't be overstating this.

— Jeffrey Lieber (@JeffLieber) April 7, 2011
